content: I think I'll start by identifying the room's purpose and measuring the space. I want to create a cozy reading nook and a comfortable sleeping area. My bedroom is a bit small, so I'll need to be mindful of the flow and negative space. I'm also thinking of moving my bed away from the wall to create a sense of separation between the sleeping area and the rest of the room. Do you have any advice on how to create a cozy reading nook?
